channel.title: The Evolving Faith Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: This is a podcast for the wounded, the misfits, and the spiritual refugees to let you know you are not alone. We're here to cultivate love and hope in the wilderness. We believe the story of God is bigger, wider, more inclusive and welcoming, filled with more love, than we could ever imagine. There's room here for everyone. There's room here for you.
channel.itunes:author: Evolving Faith

item.title: Climbing the Mountain of Injustice with Austin Channing Brown
item.description: For episode 2, Sarah and Jeff revisit Austin Channing Brown's bring-the-house-down sermon from Evolving Faith 2018. They reflect on what they've learned and experienced since that day as well as how Austin's words planted the seeds for some major shifts in their own lives.
item.content:encoded: For episode 2, Sarah and Jeff revisit Austin Channing Brown's bring-the-house-down sermon from Evolving Faith 2018. They reflect on what they've learned and experienced since that day as well as how Austin's words planted the seeds for some major shifts in their own lives.

item.title: Evolution, Apocalypse, and Remembering Rachel Held Evans
item.description: In the premiere episode of The Evolving Faith Podcast, we hear a talk given at the Evolving Faith gathering in 2018 by the late Rachel Held Evans, author, speaker, and co-founder of Evolving Faith. She talks about a tough and tender faith and what that calls us to when we encounter the oppressive, dehumanizing and unjust forces working in the world. We also welcome Rachel's husband, Dan Evans, and her sister, Amanda Held Opelt, who share with us about what gives them hope one year after Rachel's death.

item.title: Welcome To The Evolving Faith Podcast
item.description: Subscribe to The Evolving Faith Podcast in your podcast app or go to evolvingfaith.com and click on Podcast for instructions. And while you're there sign up for our newsletter so you don't miss a thing.
